name: Bubble Blasters
description:
Bubble Baster is a Sci-fi Shooter game where you need to face giant bubble Gums!

You must have bought a gum from a vending machine before... Insert a coin, turn the lever, and voilà, you received your gum, but what if now, radiations and anomalous events had enlarged and animated the bubble gums?

These giant and voracious bubble gums are now called Bubble Blasters, and your job is to control this threat! Make them enter the portal of the BSB Machine where they will be detained.
